resources.string: The Students\' Gymkhana is a student body, fostering all student activities at IIT Bhubaneswar and bridging the gap between the students and the authorities. From its genesis in the year 2010, it seeks to cultivate various qualitative approaches amongst students to master an enhanced life and is the nucleus of the numerous extra-curricular, technical and co-curricular activities held in IIT Bhubaneswar
